casebody.data:
In re UNITED STATES, et al. No. 18A410. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 19, 2018.

ORDER

UPON CONSIDERATION of the application of counsel for the applicants,

IT IS ORDERED that discovery and trial in the United States District Court for the District of Oregon, in case No. 6:15-cv-01517, are stayed pending receipt of a response, due on or before Wednesday, October 24, 2018, by 3 p.m., and further order of the undersigned or of the Court.

/s/ John G. Roberts, Jr.

Chief Justice of the United States
